::Fidgit::

She was having a bit of trouble keeping up with Beachcomber.  He was taller 
and faster than she was.  She transformed into bot mode but still had a hard 
time keeping up.  She used her small scanners to locate him so she would be 
able to help him when she finally caught up with him.
"Running uphill with short legs is not my idea of a good time."

She just kept going untill she had caught up with him.
